subject: Create subagent error hierarchy
description:
Create the error hierarchy for the subagents subsystem in `src/mamba_agents/subagents/errors.py`.

Define the following exception classes:

- `SubagentError(Exception)` — Base exception for all subagent errors
- `SubagentConfigError(SubagentError)` — Invalid subagent configuration
- `SubagentNotFoundError(SubagentError)` — Referenced subagent config not found
- `SubagentNestingError(SubagentError)` — Subagent attempted to spawn sub-subagent
- `SubagentDelegationError(SubagentError)` — Error during task delegation
- `SubagentTimeoutError(SubagentError)` — Subagent exceeded max turns

Each exception should have a descriptive message and relevant context (subagent name, config name, etc.).

**Acceptance Criteria:**

_Functional:_
- [ ] All 6 error classes defined with proper inheritance chain
- [ ] Each error includes contextual attributes (name, config_name where applicable)
- [ ] Error messages are clear and actionable

_Edge Cases:_
- [ ] Errors are picklable
- [ ] `repr()` and `str()` produce useful debugging info

_Error Handling:_
- [ ] Base `SubagentError` is catchable for all subagent-related errors

**Testing Requirements:**
• Unit: Each error class instantiation and message formatting
• Unit: Inheritance chain verification (isinstance checks)

Source: internal/specs/skills-and-subagents-SPEC.md Section 5.7-5.8
